SELECT E.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , D.* FROM (SELECT A.ORDER_NO , C.PROD_NAME , D.USER_NO , A.ORDER_PRICE , A.DEALING_STATUS , A.ORDER_STATUS , A.ORDER_QUANTITY , A.ORDER_DATE FROM TBL_ORDER A JOIN TBL_CORP_USER B ON (A.CORP_NO = B.CORP_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT C ON (A.PROD_NO = C.PROD_NO) JOIN TBL_USER D ON (A.USER_NO = D.USER_NO) WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001' ORDER BY A.ORDER_NO DESC) D ) E WHERE E.RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ORDER A WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001' AND A.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}

SELECT E.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , D.* FROM (SELECT A.ORDER_NO , C.PROD_NAME , D.USER_NO , A.ORDER_PRICE , A.DEALING_STATUS , A.ORDER_STATUS , A.ORDER_QUANTITY , A.ORDER_DATE FROM TBL_ORDER A JOIN TBL_CORP_USER B ON (A.CORP_NO = B.CORP_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT C ON (A.PROD_NO = C.PROD_NO) JOIN TBL_USER D ON (A.USER_NO = D.USER_NO) WHERE B.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001' AND A.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY A.ORDER_NO DESC) D ) E WHERE E.RNUM BETWEEN #{pageInfo.startRow} AND #{pageInfo.endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_SALES A WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001'

SELECT E.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , D.* FROM (SELECT A.SALES_NO , B.PROD_NAME , A.ORDER_NO , A.SALES_DATE , A.SALES_QUANTITY , A.SALES_AMT FROM TBL_SALES A JOIN TBL_PRODUCT B ON (A.PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO) WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001' ORDER BY A.SALES_NO DESC, A.SALES_DATE DESC) D ) E WHERE E.RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_SALES A WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001' AND A.SALES_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}

SELECT E.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , D.* FROM (SELECT A.SALES_NO , B.PROD_NAME , A.ORDER_NO , A.SALES_DATE , A.SALES_QUANTITY , A.SALES_AMT FROM TBL_SALES A JOIN TBL_PRODUCT B ON (A.PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO) WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001' AND A.SALES_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY A.SALES_NO DESC, A.SALES_DATE DESC) D ) E WHERE E.RNUM BETWEEN #{pageInfo.startRow} AND #{pageInfo.endRow}

SELECT D.TOTAL AS TOTAL_SALES , D.TOTAL * D.CORP_COMMISSION AS COMMISSION_BY_SALES , D.TOTAL * (1 - D.CORP_COMMISSION) AS SETTLEMENT_AMT FROM (SELECT SUM(C.SALES_AMT) AS TOTAL , C.CORP_NO , C.CORP_COMMISSION FROM (SELECT A.SALES_AMT , B.CORP_NO , B.CORP_COMMISSION FROM TBL_SALES A JOIN TBL_CORP_USER B ON (A.CORP_NO = B.CORP_NO) WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001' AND A.SALES_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) C GROUP BY C.CORP_NO, C.CORP_COMMISSION ) D
